title: Opening - The 5th International Workshop on Mining and Learning with Graphs
segmentation: Alright, so good morning.
And welcome to MLG 2007.
We have a great worship ahead of us.
As you know, this is the 5th edition of MLG.
These are all the previous additions and all of them have been organized as workshops within the European Conference machine learning ECM ELCD.
This year we took the chance and opportunity and maybe the risk of organizing an independent event here in Florence.
And whether or not this is going to be successful, he will decide.
The ideas behind the organization of this addition were to have a real worship, so not really publication venue.
You all have proceedings in your bags, but this is not really like a publication is more like to help you to follow the talks.
They're all extended abstracts and hopefully the participation here.
We will be just driving by interest in the field.
Still, we decided to have a strict review process, so we put together program committee of about 50 researchers.

And let me take the opportunity to thank all of them and also to thank the additional reviewers that did an amazing job for selecting the extended abstracts and they helped us to put together what I hope is a high quality.
Program.
